<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class observes instruction insertions/removals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// InstructionSelect stores an iterator of the instruction prior to the one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that is currently being selected to determine which instruction to select</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// next. Previously this meant that selecting multiple instructions at once was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// illegal behavior due to potential invalidation of this iterator. This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a non-obvious limitation for selector implementers. Therefore, to allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// deletion of arbitrary instructions, we detect this case and continue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// selection with the predecessor of the deleted instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/instructionselect/miiteratormaintainer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/instructionselect/miiteratormaintainer">InstructionSelect::MIIteratorMaintainer</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselchangeobserver">GISelChangeObserver</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;const MachineInstr &#42;, 32&gt;</a> CreatedInstrs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
